about_the_game:
WELCOME, MORTALl!


In the mysterious land of ancient Crete, sunlight shines on the shores of Palaiochora. A hero has arrived to save the disputes of Olympus!
In this game, you will immerse yourself in an exciting journey full of mystery and challenges, solving intricate puzzles to restore the balance of the Greek sky.

Join Acacius, a brave young man with the power to change seasons, in his quest to free the trapped souls of Persephone and Demeter. Will you be able to overcome the challenges that lurk in the forests of Xyloskalo in autumn, or in the icy peaks of the Léfka Óri Gorge in winter? Find out as you unravel the mythological plot that awaits you in every corner of this captivating world!

HIGHLIGHTED FEATURES


  • Peaceful and Relaxing Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a captivating world full of beauty and serenity as you explore landscapes inspired by ancient Greece.
  • Innovative seasonal change mechanics: Use the equinox syrinx to alter the environment in your favor, solving puzzles and unlocking new paths in your quest.
  • Diegetic story with great mythological load: Discover an exciting narrative that immerses you in the rich Greek mythology, with intriguing characters and epic moments.
  • Unique art style: Enjoy stunning voxel art graphics that bring environments and characters to life, as you immerse yourself in a world full of color and detail.

    Get ready for adventure, we present Season Changer.

name: Season Changer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 18362.0
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic journey through ancient Crete, where Greek history and mythology come to life. Solve clever puzzles, explore enchanting landscapes and unravel an exciting story. Join Acacio and discover the magic of the seasons today!
